Creator: John Savelid
Heading: Join us on a kayak weekend
Text: We have a scheduled kayak weekend in late June, and another tour in August. Or book your own private weekend.

Creator: John Savelid
Heading: A great day for skating - see the movie
Text: November have been a great month for skating, good black ice everywhere, low temperatures and no snow. We have a got a lot of days on the ice, a perfect start of the skating season
